publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7113 Jim Hume: Quintinshill Rail Disaster, Special Dedication of Commemorative Plaque—That the Parliament notes the recent special dedication ceremony at Quintinshill Bridge, near Gretna Green, to unveil a commemorative plaque to those lost in the Quintinshill rail disaster on 22 May 1915; congratulates the community council of Springfield and Gretna Green on deciding to place a plaque at Quintinshill Bridge and for holding a special ceremony; remembers the 227 lives lost in one of the world’s worst rail disasters of the last century, many of them Royal Scots en route to fight in the Gallipoli campaign; recognises the existence of a separate memorial to the disaster at the Gretna Green Visitors Centre, and supports the development by the Springfield and Gretna Heritage Trail of a marked circular walk that will include the bridge.

S3M-7113 Quintinshill Rail Disaster, Special Dedication of Commemorative Plaque (lodged on 28 September 2010) Hugh O’Donnell*, Mike Pringle*, Bill Kidd*, Jamie Hepburn*, Kenneth Gibson*, Hugh Henry*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bob Doris*, Jim Tolson*
S3M-7113 Quintinshill Rail Disaster, Special Dedication of Commemorative Plaque (lodged on 28 September 2010) Willie Coffey*, Gil Paterson*
